meanings.sent1: After a long day of work, I felt fatigable and ready for bed.
meanings.sent2: She knew that her fatigable body needed rest after the intense workout.
meanings.sent3: The fatigable puppy fell asleep in the middle of playing fetch.
meanings.sent4: His fatigable mind struggled to focus after studying for hours.
meanings.sent5: The old car's fatigable engine sputtered and died on the highway.

meanings.sent1: The young athlete's fatigable muscles needed time to recover after the race.
meanings.sent2: Being fatigable, she made sure to take breaks during the long hike.
meanings.sent3: The fatigable phone battery died just when he needed to make an important call.
meanings.sent4: Her fatigable immune system struggled to fight off the cold virus.
meanings.sent5: The fatigable old bridge creaked under the weight of the heavy truck.
